org.arl.fjage.shell

Class ShellAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arl.fjage.Agent
      • org.arl.fjage.shell.ShellAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, Messenger, TimestampProvider

    public class ShellAgent
extends Agent
    Shell agent runs in a container and allows execution of shell commands and scripts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShellAgent

        public ShellAgent(ScriptEngine engine)
        Create a shell agent without a user console. This is typically useful for provinding shell services to other agents.
        Parameters:
        engine - script engine to use

      • ShellAgent

        public ShellAgent(ScriptEngine engine,
                  boolean ephemeral)
        Create a transient shell agent without a user console. This is typically used for initialization or short-lived scripts. This shell automatically terminates when all initrc scripts are executed.
        Parameters:
        engine - script engine to use
        ephemeral - true for transient shell, false for long-lived shell

      • ShellAgent

        public ShellAgent(Shell shell,
                  ScriptEngine engine)
        Create a shell for user interaction.
        Parameters:
        shell - user console
        engine - script engine to use

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: Agent
        Called by the container when the agent is started. This method is usually overridden by a class implementing an agent to initialize the agent and its behaviors.
        Overrides:
        init in class Agent

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Description copied from class: Agent
        Called by the container when the agent is terminated. This method may optionally be overridden to provide a clean up before termination.
        Overrides:
        shutdown in class Agent

      • setInitrc

        public void setInitrc(java.lang.String script)
        Sets the name of the initialization script to setup the console environment. This method should only be called before the agent is added to a running container.
        Parameters:
        script - script name.

      • setInitrc

        public void setInitrc(java.io.File script)
        Sets the initialization script file to setup the console environment. This method should only be called before the agent is added to a running container.
        Parameters:
        script - script file.

      • setInitrc

        public void setInitrc(java.lang.String name,
                      java.io.Reader reader)
        Sets the initialization script from a reader to setup the console environment. This method should only be called before the agent is added to a running container.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the reader.
        reader - script reader.
